item.description:
Learn about the Enneagram Basic 9 Types, what type you are and personal growth and relationship tips relevant to your tips. Herb acts out the types with hats and songs. Lots of fun. Bring your friends. Great way to understand yourself, your past and those important in your life.

 

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a relationship coach and therapist, working with individuals, couples and families. He leads team building and staff development trainings in organizations and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living.

www.herbpearce.com

7:30-10pm
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram Personality Types Workshop
